|brand = Sophos |model = XG 115 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = rev 3 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = security appliance |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 4BL00130C2X10 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;E3940; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- x86-64 Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.6 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FWSQ; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SO-DIMM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = ADATA;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Intel;WGI211AT; |eth2chip = Intel;WGI211AT; |eth3chip = Intel;WGI211AT; |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6176; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 7C:5A:1C
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, M.2 (SSD), SFP (GBIC), SATA |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_sfp_num = 1 |exp_M.2 = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, USB Female Micro-B,, RJ45,, (38400 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, HDMI out, power switch, SPF/RJ45 Combo port, Dual PSU, metal case, heat sink |addchip = LPC I/O Controller;Nuvoton;NCT6776D;;1;,,, 6A Distributed Power Unit;Renesas;P9148;;6;,,, USB to Full Handshake UART IC;FTDI;FT231X;;1;,,, FPGA;Lattice Semiconductor;LCMX02-1200UHC;;1;,,, 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02D;;1;,,, Programmable Multi-Channel PMIC;Renesas;P91E0;;1;,,, 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Shifter;TI;TXS0104E;;2;,,, 20A Synchronous Buck SWIFT Converter;TI;TPS53353;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD17505Q5A;;3;,,, 5V Multichannel RS232 Line Driver/Receiver;Texas Instruments;TRS213;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = Nexcom |manuf_model = DNB130-S |manuf_rev = Ver C |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 08/17/2022 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07B454S4R |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Intel Atom]]'' Quad-Core (@1.6GHz) *Memory: 4GB DDR3L (SODIMM) RAM *Storage: 16MB SPI Flash, :64GB ADATA M.2 SSD *Network: 3x Gigabit Ethernet ports, :1x Shared Gigabit/SFP port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: Dual 12V, 3A via barrel
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Sophos XG 105 rev 3 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Sophos XG 105 rev 3 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:Sophos XG 115 rev 3 Internal.jpeg|Internal View </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
